titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2590) making appropriations for the Treasury Department, the United States Postal Service, the Executive Office of the President, and certain Independent Agencies, for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2002, and for other purposes.

action.text: Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2590 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be read by paragraph. Bill is open to amendments.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-158, by Mr. Linder.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 58.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 206.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 293 - 129 (Roll no. 267).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/24/2001--Reported to House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 2590 (FY2002 Treasury Department, United States Postal Service, Executive Office of the President, and certain Independent Agencies appropriations).
